ResearchProjectDef.label: holo-projection
ResearchProjectDef.description: A new step in entertainment technology. Via a complex array of lenses, focused light and a little dosage of clever engineering, ethereal images illuminate and enrich every environment. As a true staple of every spacer-tech colony. It allows for the projection of various images, media and audio information in ways never before seen. They even offer various usages, when it comes to passive entertainment, education, or a slight bit of propaganda, now and then.
